panels.description: Negative Delta: usage > commit per month

targets.expr: max(grafanacloud_instance_billable_usage{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_metrics_billable_series{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_metrics_overage{org_id="${org_id}"}) * on (id) group_left(name) max by(id, name) (grafanacloud_instance_info{name=~"${tenant:value}", org_id="${org_id}"})

max(grafanacloud_traces_instance_usage{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_traces_usage{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_traces_overage{org_id="${org_id}"}) * on (id) group_left(name) max by(id, name) (grafanacloud_traces_instance_info{name=~"${tenant:value}", org_id="${org_id}"})

max(grafanacloud_logs_instance_usage{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_logs_usage{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_logs_overage{org_id="${org_id}"}) * on (id) group_left(name) max by(id, name) (grafanacloud_logs_instance_info{name=~"${tenant:value}", org_id="${org_id}"})

sum(sum(sum(grafanacloud_grafana_instance_active_user_count{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) * on(id) group_left(name) grafanacloud_grafana_instance_info{name=~"${tenant:value}", org_id="${org_id}"}) by (name))
/
sum(sum(sum(grafanacloud_grafana_instance_active_user_count{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) * on(id) group_left(name) grafanacloud_grafana_instance_info{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (name))
*
sum(avg without(monetary) (grafanacloud_org_grafana_overage{org_id="${org_id}"}))
sum(max(grafanacloud_instance_samples_discarded_per_second{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id, reason)) by (id, reason) * on(id) group_left(name) grafanacloud_instance_info{org_id="${org_id}"}

panels.title: Metrics Active Series Ingestion Rate per Minute (DPM)

targets.expr:
topk(20, sum by (dashboardName, folderName) (
    count_over_time({instance_type="grafana", org_id="${org_id}"} 
        |= "data-request" |~ `error=".+"` != "dashboardId=0"
        | regexp `folderName=(?P<folderName>.+) dashboardName=(?P<dashboardName>.+) dashboardId=`
        | label_format dashboardName=`{{replace "\"" "" .dashboardName}}`
        | label_format folderName=`{{replace "\"" "" .folderName}}`
[$__range])))
count by(folderName, dashboardName, instance_id) (rate({instance_type="grafana", org_id="$org_id"} | logfmt [$__auto]))
count by(folderName, dashboardName, username, instance_id) (rate({instance_type="grafana", org_id="$org_id"} | logfmt [$__auto]))

panels.description: Total Billable Users represents the number of unique Grafana and OnCall users across all instances. A user that is active in both Grafana and OnCall will be counted in each service separately, but will only be counted once in Total Billable Users. See [Billing for Active Users](https://grafana.com/docs/grafana-cloud/fundamentals/billing-and-usage/#billing-for-active-users) for additional information.
panels.title: Billable Users Breakdown

max(grafanacloud_instance_billable_usage{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_metrics_billable_series{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() grafanacloud_org_metrics_overage{org_id="${org_id}"} * on (id) group_left(name) grafanacloud_instance_info{org_id="${org_id}"}

max(grafanacloud_traces_instance_usage{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) / ignoring(id) group_left() max(grafanacloud_org_traces_usage{org_id="${org_id}"}) by (id) * ignoring(id,org_id,cluster) group_left() grafanacloud_org_traces_overage{org_id="${org_id}"} * on (id) group_left(name) grafanacloud_traces_instance_info{org_id="${org_id}"}
